name: LiVE Mag! Subscription
description: Join our poetry and art-lover's circle with a 2-year SUBSCRIPTION. Go the extra mile and you'll be among the first of our friends to get the new issue, ETA by March 1, 2022. We'll send our newest #18 hot off the press.

name: By and By
description: Gift a freind or treat yourself to this 2021 chapbook of 12 birthday poems dedicated to colleagues by Jeffrey Cyphers Wright.
